revision.comment: Repair [[:Category:Pages using duplicate arguments in template calls|duplicate template args]]
revision.text:
{{Talk header}} {{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=14:45, 5 December 2011 (UTC) |action1link=Talk:Russian battleship Poltava (1894)/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=464215849 |action2=GTC |action2date=16:24, 17 December 2012 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:Featured topic candidates/Petropavlovsk class battleships/archive1 |action2result=promoted |ftname=Petropavlovsk class battleships |action3=WAR |action3date=20:36, 11 April 2014 (UTC) |action3link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Russian battleship Poltava (1894) |action3result=approved |action3oldid=603577519 |action4=FAC |action4date=06:34, 17 May 2014 (UTC) |action4link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Russian battleship Poltava (1894)/archive1 |action4result=promoted |action4oldid=608927577 |currentstatus=FA |dykdate=1 November 2011 |dykentry=... that the [[Russian battleship Poltava (1894)|Russian battleship '''''Poltava''''']] was the only one of her [[Petropavlovsk class battleship|class]] to survive the [[Russo-Japanese War]]? |topic=war |four=no }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Russia|class=FA|importance=Low|hist=yes|mil=yes|tech=yes}} {{WPMILHIST|class=FA|A-Class=pass|OMT=1|Japanese=yes|Maritime=yes|Russian=yes|WWI=yes}} {{WikiProject Japan|class=FA|importance=low|milhist=y}} {{WikiProject Soviet Union|class=FA|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Ships|class=FA}} }} == Requested move ==
:''The following discussion is an archived discussion of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on the talk page. No further edits should be made to this section. '' The result of the move request was: '''pages moved'''. Rough consensus to move, and the one objection to two moves on the basis of length of service only is not persuasive. [[User:Andrewa|Andrewa]] ([[User talk:Andrewa|talk]]) 01:59, 25 October 2011 (UTC) ---- * [[Japanese battleship Tango]] → [[Russian battleship Poltava (1894)]] * [[Japanese battleship Sagami]] → [[Russian battleship Peresvet]] * [[Japanese battleship Iwami]] → [[Russian battleship Oryol]] – These ships are much more notable fro their Russian service than for their Japanese service. [[User:Buggie111|Buggie111]] ([[User talk:Buggie111|talk]]) 13:59, 16 October 2011 (UTC) :I absolutely agree, [[User:Manxruler|Manxruler]] ([[User talk:Manxruler|talk]]) 22:17, 16 October 2011 (UTC) :Agreed - the ship spent slightly more than half of her career in the Russian navy, which composes the vast majority of the content of this article. Only three sentences are devoted to her service with the Japanese navy. [[User:Parsecboy|Parsecboy]] ([[User talk:Parsecboy|talk]]) 23:06, 17 October 2011 (UTC) ::'''Comment''' that is not true about the Sagami or the Iwami, which spent almost their entire careers in Japanese service. That is only true of Poltava. [[Special:Contributions/70.24.251.158|70.24.251.158]] ([[User talk:70.24.251.158|talk]]) 05:18, 19 October 2011 (UTC) *'''Support''' move of all three ships to their original Russian names. As stated, their most notable service was as Russian battleships. [[User:Benea|Benea]] ([[User talk:Benea|talk]]) 14:07, 19 October 2011 (UTC) :''The above discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on this talk page. No further edits should be made to this section.
== 14 inch cannon ?? == Forgive my bad English. In the article someone wrote: :"The Poltava was hit by twelve '''14-inch''' and eight 12-inch shells during the battle, killing 12 and wounding 43.[12]" The problem is that none of the Japanese battleships that participated in the battle was equipped with guns of this caliber.--[[User:Midnight bird|Midnight bird]] ([[User talk:Midnight bird|talk]]) 12:59, 16 January 2013 (UTC) == New image == [[File:Japanese battleship Tango, 1907.jpg|thumb]] In case this article's main editors are interested. — [[User:Crisco 1492|Crisco 1492]] ([[User talk:Crisco 1492|talk]]) 11:59, 11 October 2013 (UTC)
